Hi there user!

Here is a a user-friendly To Do List application!

Step by step:
(1) Top heading displays your current date, so you don't have to check all the time.
(2) Add your goals for the day in the "What's on your mind today..." box. Followed by clicking the "Add" button on th right. Your tasks will appear at the below.
(3) Click on the left circle in each task to strike-out completed tasks.
(4) Click on the bin icon on the right once you have completed your tasks to remove them from the list.

Stop procrastinating and complete your goals!
